headline: Manchester City Women sign England U-19 international Eve Annets
summary: Manchester City have signed England youth international and former Reading goalkeeper Eve Annets on a four-year contract. The 18-year-old progressed through the Royals’ academy, making three appearances first-team appearances last season and a debut for […]

headline: Brazil Women eliminate Olympic hosts France
summary: Brazil beat France 1-0 in the Olympic Quarter-Finals, Germany and Spain went through on penalties and USA edged Japan after extra-time. Gabi Portilho made the breakthrough on 82 minutes for Brazil from Adriana’s through ball. […]

headline: Three-way battle in Sports Direct Women’s Premiership

headline: China midfielder Shen Mengyu joins London City Lionesses
summary: Shen Mengyu has signed a three-year contract with London City Lionesses following her departure from SWPL champions Celtic. The 22-year-old made the China squad for the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup, making the starting line-up […]
